Oblivion can run 4 different languages: English, Spanish, French, and I don't know what the last one is prob. Russian. 

So if you have the English one, all you need to do is change the language to French or Spanish you fucking French idiots.

The point is, is that instead of starting your own little pool here, you could just help an existing Torrent.
